message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a product that I believe would be valuable to you. I'm offering it to you for $200. What do you think?
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I was hoping to stay within my budget. Would you consider lowering the price to $175?
Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to get closer to $190 for it.  Would you be willing to meet me halfway?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your response. I'm still aiming to keep my expenses within my budget. Would you consider $180 as a fair offer?
